text: Think Positively, Network Well, Exercise Daily, Eat Healthy, Work Hard, Stay Strong, Build Faith, Worry Less, Read More, Be Happy, Volunteer Freely, Relax Often, Love Always, Live Forever
Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

text: The Best Way to Predict the Future is to Create it.
author: Peter Drucker & Abraham Lincoln

text: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the World are the ones who do.
author: Steve Jobs

text: By doing nothing, you become nothing.
